sourcesContent: import{INVALID_ARGUMENT as r}from"@liff/consts";import{createLiffError as e}from"@liff/util";import{fetch as t,getEndPoint as n}from"@liff/server-api";var o=function(r){return"object"==typeof r&&null!==r&&function(r){return"string"==typeof r||r instanceof String}(r.type)};function i(t){return Promise.reject(e(r,t))}function f(r){if(!function(r){return Array.isArray(r)&&r.every(o)}(r))return i("Parameter 'messages' must be an array of { type, ... }");var e=r.length;return e<1||e>5?i("Number of messages should be in range 1 to 5."):t(n("message"),{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify({messages:r})})}export{f as sendMessages};
